member.name: T:bezpieczna_paczkaApp.PlayerProgress
member.summary: Static class responsible for storing and managing player's progress across all game levels. This class acts as a centralized storage for stars earned in each level.

member.name: F:bezpieczna_paczkaApp.PlayerProgress.TotalLevelsCount
member.summary: Total number of levels available in the game Used for calculating the maximum possible stars a player can earn Update this value when adding new levels to the game

member.name: F:bezpieczna_paczkaApp.PlayerProgress.MaxStarsPerLevel
member.summary: Maximum number of stars that can be earned per single level Based on the scoring system: 90% = 1 star, 95% = 2 stars, 100% = 3 stars

member.name: F:bezpieczna_paczkaApp.PlayerProgress.VEHICLE_1_THRESHOLD
member.summary: Stars required to unlock vehicle 1 (available from start).

member.name: F:bezpieczna_paczkaApp.PlayerProgress.VEHICLE_2_THRESHOLD
member.summary: Stars required to unlock vehicle 2.

member.name: F:bezpieczna_paczkaApp.PlayerProgress.VEHICLE_3_THRESHOLD
member.summary: Stars required to unlock vehicle 3.

member.name: F:bezpieczna_paczkaApp.PlayerProgress.TotalVehiclesCount
member.summary: Total number of vehicles in the game.

member.name: F:bezpieczna_paczkaApp.PlayerProgress.saveFilePath
member.summary: Path to the progress save file

member.name: F:bezpieczna_paczkaApp.PlayerProgress.selectedVehicleID
member.summary: Currently selected vehicle ID (player's choice among unlocked vehicles)

member.name: F:bezpieczna_paczkaApp.PlayerProgress.starsPerLevel
member.summary: Dictionary storing the best star count achieved for each level

member.name: M:bezpieczna_paczkaApp.PlayerProgress.SetStars(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Records the number of stars earned for a specific level Implements "best score" logic - only updates if the new score is higher than previously saved This ensures that replaying a level with a worse result does not overwrite a better previous score
member.param: ID of the level that the player completed
Number of the stars that player collected

member.name: M:bezpieczna_paczkaApp.PlayerProgress.Initialize(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the path where progress file will be saved. Must be called before LoadProgress() or SaveProgress().

member.name: M:bezpieczna_paczkaApp.PlayerProgress.SaveProgress
member.summary: Saves current progress to file. Format: one line per level as "level_X=Y" where X is level ID and Y is stars.

member.name: M:bezpieczna_paczkaApp.PlayerProgress.LoadProgress
member.summary: Loads progress from file. If file doesn't exist, starts with empty progress.

member.name: M:bezpieczna_paczkaApp.PlayerProgress.ResetProgress
member.summary: Clears all saved progress, resetting the game to initial state Useful for implementing a "New Game" or "Reset Progress" feature

member.name: M:bezpieczna_paczkaApp.PlayerProgress.GetStars(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves the number of stars earned for a specific level
member.param: ID of the level, from which the number of collected stars will be counted

member.name: M:bezpieczna_paczkaApp.PlayerProgress.GetTotalStars
member.summary: Calculates the sum of all stars earned across all completed levels Used for displaying overall player progress in the level selection screen
member.returns: Number of total stars collected from all the levels

member.name: M:bezpieczna_paczkaApp.PlayerProgress.GetMaxPossibleStars
member.summary: Calculates the theoretical maximum stars achievable in the entire game Used for displaying progress in format "X / Y" (e.g., "5 / 9")

member.name: M:bezpieczna_paczkaApp.PlayerProgress.IsLevelCompleted(System.Int32)
member.summary: Checks whether a specific level has been successfully completed A level is consIDered "completed" if the player earned at least 1 star
member.returns: True or false whether the level is completed or not

member.name: M:bezpieczna_paczkaApp.PlayerProgress.IsLevelUnlocked(System.Int32)
member.summary: Checks if a specific level is unlocked. Level 1 is always unlocked. Other levels require previous level to be completed.

member.name: M:bezpieczna_paczkaApp.PlayerProgress.GetCurrentVehicleID
member.summary: Returns the ID of the best unlocked vehicle based on total stars.

member.name: M:bezpieczna_paczkaApp.PlayerProgress.SetCurrentVehicleID(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the currently selected vehicle if it is unlocked.
member.returns: True if vehicle was selected, false if locked

member.name: M:bezpieczna_paczkaApp.PlayerProgress.IsVehicleUnlocked(System.Int32)
member.summary: Checks if a specific vehicle is unlocked.

member.name: M:bezpieczna_paczkaApp.PlayerProgress.GetVehicleThreshold(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the star threshold required to unlock a specific vehicle.
